EmailTemplate.subject: ExxonMobil Fleet Card
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for taking the time to go through the card set up process. I have attached the Fleet Data form I completed while on the phone with you. Please keep this for your records.
You should receive two packages in the mail in the next 7 - 10 business days. The first will contain the cards (mailed from our Partners in South Portland, ME). Included will be instructions on accessing your account online (www.exxonmobilfleetonline.com / https://www.exxonmobiluniversalonline.com/online/). The Second (mailed from Denver, CO) will contain your Driver ID Numbers (DIDs). These two packages may not arrive together or even in the same week.
Without the DIDs the cards cannot be used though they are active once they are set up. You will be able to make transactions as soon you have them if you know your DIDs in advance (you provided the numbers during set up). You should be able to get DIDs from the website as well, once you have the cards.
Feel free to call if something should arise before then. As a sales representative, my ability to help at this stage is limited but I will do what I can to provided assistance. Alternatively, you can reach our customer service by calling 800-492-0669.
Brian Fitzpatrick Fuel Services Specialist ExxonMobil Fuel Services Phone: (847) 440-1724 Fax: (207) 791-1610 Email: bfitzpatrick@fleetlink.com www.exxonmobilfleetoffers.com/brianfitzpatrick
